metadata.title: CVE-2022-33127 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description: The function that calls the diff tool in Diffy 3.4.1 does not properlyhandle double quotes in a filename when run in a windows environment. Thisallows attackers to execute arbitrary commands via a crafted string.

criterions.comment: ruby-diffy package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
